metadata.title: CVE-2023-29552 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The Service Location Protocol (SLP, RFC 2608) allows an unauthenticated,remote attacker to register arbitrary services. This could allow theattacker to use spoofed UDP traffic to conduct a denial-of-service attackwith a significant amplification factor.

criterions.comment: openslp-dfsg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
